string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: Can I come by and pick up the couch tomorrow?
How big is the carpet again?
What color is the couch? I would just like to confirm
Do you have change for 50 Euros?
Thank you so much for the bag! I love it!
Do you have any extra stuff I can buy?
